Summary: As a visitor from Europe, I can say that We stayed in this place 4 times now. We simply love this place. Nice people, friendly staff, non of the problems other writers seem to had. We like to come back to this place for many years to come, and I can recomment this to everyone! Thom van Lente

Summary Heading: This is an Apt. Complex - Park Tow Port - This place tows everyone!
Summary: This place is otherwise known as Park Newport - An apt. Complex that is in a state of disrepair. Nice setting with horrible management, overly aggressive towing/parking enforcement. I had a horrible experience with this place. Do not do business with this place as they are very unprofessional in more than many ways.
Three words... DON'T STAY HERE.  Oakwood used to be a safe bet but if they are listing appartments like these, I'd say don't go through Oakwood anymore.

Summary Heading: Park Newport has been a terrible experience for us.
Summary: We have been in corporate housing. So far we have had our resident car towed that cost us 150.00 plus a days work all because they let any guest in without reserving enough parking for their tenants. In addition, the racoons from the wildlife refuge eat out of the garbage bin all night and fight and make so much noise that one cannot sleep.  Park Newport refuses to fix the problem as we have been complaining for weeks now. Their is no air conditioning so that one is not able to sleep at night when the racoons are in the bins all night. In addition, they are slow on fixing broken washers in the laundry facilities and the courtesy patrol charges 40.00 if you lock yourself out of your apartment.
